damaged.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

lore: The Doomsday Ark is a direct-fire plasma artillery piece so powerful that it can threaten even the super-heavy war engines of the lesser races. This vehicle is solely dedicated to overwhelming long-ranged firepower, even diverting energy from its motive functions in order to unleash absolute obliteration upon the foe.

otherAbilities.Overwhelming Obliteration:: In your Movement phase , if this model Remains Stationary , until the end of the turn, its doomsday cannon has the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.
